Title: India Post Technical Supervisor Recruitment 2025 Notification
Summary:
- India Post Recruitment 2025: The Government of India, Department of Posts, has released the India Post Technical Supervisor (Group C) Recruitment 2025 notification to fill 1 vacancy for the post of Technical Supervisor in the Odisha Circle
- The official notification PDF has been published on the India Post website
- The application process starts immediately, and the last date to apply is 15th April 2025

Title: IREL Recruitment 2025 Notification
Summary:
- IREL Recruitment 2025:  IREL (India) Limited, formerly known as Indian Rare Earths Limited, has released the  IREL Apprentice Recruitment 2025  notification to recruit  72 vacancies  for various apprentice positions under the Apprentices Act, 1961
- irel
- co

Title: IIEST Recruitment 2025 Notification
Summary:
- The Indian Institute of Engineering Science & Technology (IIEST), Shibpur, has released the official notification for the recruitment of a  Scientific Administrative Assistant  in the  Department of Civil Engineering
- The walk-in interview for this position will be held on  20th March 2025
- This recruitment is for a temporary post with a tenure of  3

Title: ERNET India Recruitment 2025 Notification
Summary:
- ERNET India has released the official notification for the recruitment of various technical and non-technical posts under the ICT & Data Centre Setup Project
- The ERNET India Recruitment 2025 notification was released on  20th February 2025 , and eligible candidates can apply by submitting their CV/Bio-data via email to  recruitment@ernet
- in  by  4:00 PM on 20th March 2025

Title: Central Rice Research Institute Field Operator Vacancy Notification
Summary:
- ICAR-CRRI Field Operator (FO) Recruitment 2025: Central Rice Research Institute (CRRI) has released the Official Notification for the recruitment of a Field Operator (FO) under the project titled  “Developing precision nitrogen management protocols for rice using remote sensing and geospatial tools”
- The ICAR-CRRI Field Operator Recruitment 2025 Notification has been released, and the Walk-in-Interview is scheduled for 25th March 2025
- The last date to appear for the interview is 25th March 2025, and candidates must report by 10:30 A

Title: MANAGE Internship Programme
Summary:
Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Duration: 3 to 6 months.
Stipend: ₹ 5000 per month
Benefits:
For 3 months Internship: ₹ 10,000/- per month with free boarding and lodging.
For 6 months Internship: ₹ 35,000/- per month.
Eligibility: Completed/ongoing PhD or M.Sc in Extension Education/ Economics/ Sociology/ Psychology/ MSW/ Journalism/ Communication/ Environmental Science.
Application Process: Online

Title: Prime Minister's Internship Scheme 2024
Summary:
Internship in 500 different sector companies
Total Vacancies: 80,000+
Qualification: Matriculation (10th Class) Pass or higher.
Stipend: ₹ 5000 per month
Age Limit: 21-24 years
Application Procedure: Online registration

Title: Ministry of Social Justice Issued Research Associate Vacancy Notification
Summary:
- Ministry of Social Justice Recruitment 2025 : The Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment has released a notification for the recruitment of Research Associates (Consultants) at Dr
- Ambedkar International Centre (DAIC), New Delhi
- This is a great opportunity for candidates with expertise in Social Sciences, Law, Economics, and Governance Policy

Title: Ministry of Social Justice Issued Young Professional Vacancy Notification
Summary:
- Ministry of Social Justice Recruitment 2025 : Dr
- Ambedkar International Centre (DAIC) under the Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment has announced recruitment for Young Professionals in 2025
- This recruitment aims to engage skilled professionals to contribute to policy-making, research, and social-economic transformation

Title: LHMC Recruitment 2025 Notification
Summary:
- LHMC Recruitment 2025: Lady Hardinge Medical College and Associated Hospitals are inviting applications for 273 posts of Senior Resident in various specialized departments on a regular basis (for 03 years)
- Eligible and interested candidates should submit the completed application form along with the mentioned documents to the R&I Department of LHMC in person or by post

Title: MRVC Recruitment 2025 Notification
Summary:
- MRVC   Recruitment 2025 : The Mumbai Railway Vikas Corporation Ltd (MRVC), a public sector undertaking under the Ministry of Railways, is seeking dynamic candidates for the 01 position of AGM/JGM/DGM (Rolling Stock) on a contractual basis
- The contract will be initially for two years, with the possibility of extension
- Interested candidates should apply via email with the required documents by April 10, 2025

Title: IIIT Kalyani Recruitment 2025 Notification
Summary:
- IIIT Kalyani Faculty Recruitment 2025: The Indian Institute of Information Technology (IIIT), Kalyani, has released the Official Notification for the recruitment of Faculty Posts
- The IIIT Kalyani Faculty Recruitment 2025 Notification was released on 13 March 2025, and the Online Application process will be open from 13 March 2025 to 15 April 2025
- Eligible candidates can apply for IIIT Kalyani Faculty Recruitment 2025 through the official website at  iiitkalyani

Title: IRCON Recruitment 2025 Notification
Summary:
- IRCON Recruitment 2025 : The IRCON International Limited, a Navratna Public Sector Undertaking under the Ministry of Railways is hiring for the 01 position of Manager/Quality on a contract basis
- The selected candidates will receive a fixed consolidated salary of Rs
- 60,000 per month

Title: AAI Recruitment Notification
Summary:
- AAI Recruitment 2025 : The Airports Authority of India (AAI), Civil Aviation Training College (CATC) in Prayagraj, is inviting applications for the 01 position of Medical Consultant (Non-Specialist Doctor) on a contractual basis
- The appointment is initially for one year, which can be extended
- Applicants must have an MBBS degree

Title: UP Police Constable Final Result
Summary:
- UP Police Constable Final Result : The Uttar Pradesh Police Recruitment and Promotion Board (UPPRPB) has officially announced the  UP Police Constable Final Result 2025  on  13th March 2025
- Candidates who appeared for the recruitment examination can now check their results on the official website,  uppbpb

Summary:

Title: ADA Project Scientist B and C Recruitment 2025 Notification
Summary:
- ADA   Recruitment 2025 : The Aeronautical Development Agency (ADA), under the Ministry of Defence, Government of India, is inviting applications for the 137 positions of Project Scientist ‘B’ and Project Scientist ‘C’ on a limited tenure contract basis
- These positions are open to candidates with a bachelor’s degree in technology
- Interested candidates can apply online through the ADA website from March 17, 2025 to April 21, 2025
